game.title: Quantum Rift
game.synopsis: In a world where quantum technology has advanced to unimaginable heights, a catastrophic event known as "The Great Rift" has torn apart the fabric of space-time, creating parallel universes and causing chaos throughout the multiverse. You play as a skilled scientist who must navigate these rifts and repair the damage before it's too late.
game.beginning: The game begins in a world that was once home to a thriving metropolis, but is now on the brink of destruction. The player's character has been awakened from cryosleep by an AI system known as "Erebus," which informs them of the catastrophic event and sets them on a quest to find a way to repair the damage.
game.ending: As the player navigates through parallel universes, they will encounter various characters who hold the key to repairing the rifts. By solving puzzles and making choices that affect the fate of the multiverse, the player's ultimate goal is to merge the parallel universes back into a single reality.
